short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Logs each cigarette smoked and shows time since last one.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CigaretteLogger: Track your smoking habits in real-time. Receive reminders of the time since your last cigarette. Review and manage your smoking log effortlessly.
